p: The reported number of dengue incidences was collected on monthly basis from the Regional Epidemiology Unit in the District of Gampaha for the period 2005 to 2014 in all fifteen MOH areas in the district. The total number of dengue cases was plotted yearly to identify patterns in the incidence distributions. Then, the average number of dengue cases was georeferenced in the district as claimed by each MOH area. Figure 1 shows the incidence rate per 100,000 population and the average number of dengue case reported from 2005 to 2014 in each MOH area in the District of Gampaha.
